pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple and efficient PCB design tools from China, free forever Brand-new interactive routing engine, smooth and not stuck Completely independent intellectual property rights, allowing you to focus on design with confidence The EDA Tool of Choice for Next Generation Engineers
简单、高效的国产PCB设计工具，永久免费 完全的独立自主知识产权，让您放心专注于设计 下一代工程师的首选EDA工具
